details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.3 Document Information Dictionary - Subject and dc:description
details.description: The value of Subject entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property dc:description['x-default'] shall be equivalent

rule.description: The value of Subject entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property dc:description['x-default'] shall be equivalent

error.message: The value of Subject entry from the document Info dictionary and its matching XMP property dc:description['x-default'] are not equivalent (Info /Subject = %1, XMP dc:description['x-default'] = %2)
